name: Aunt Cass Café
location: Disney California Adventure Park, San Fransokyo Square

items.title: Megabot Sipper
items.description: includes choice of Fountain Beverage at time of purchase. Limit two (2) per person, per transaction. No discounts apply.

items.title: Chicken Pot Pie Soup
items.description: Chicken Pot Pie in a Bread Bowl with Crispy Fried Egg Roll Wrappers

items.description: Walt's Chili in a Mickey-shaped Bread Bowl
